page.title: 07RECREATION AND LEISURE
page.content: {(CONTINUED FROM PREVIOUS PAGE) } The general publics use of the centre is two thousand five hundred per week. From Monday to Friday it is open to the public from 5.30pm to 11.30pm. On Saturday it is open from 8.00am till 1.00pm and from 9.00am till 5.00pm on Sundays.There are fifty two differeent sports available.The most popular being football,racquet games and swimming. The twenty five to thirty age group use the complex the most.The centre's strengths according to the manager,are two big housing estates nearby,and therefore a big catchment area,and easy access. The centre is flexible as they run thenselves. On average people in the urban areas watch television for 4-6 hours each day. These were mainly old people, housewives and we think an increasing number of young unemployed.
